text: Doris Lucy Emdin (1905-1967), was a female English international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== After being eliminated in the first round of the singles event of the 1934 World Championships, she reached the quarter- finals of the 1938 World Championships in the same event. ==Personal life== Her younger sister Dora Emdin was also a notable table tennis international. She married Sidney Hearn in 1956 and died in 1967. ==See also== * List of table tennis players ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1967 deaths Category:English female table tennis players
title: Doris Emdin
